Description:
Be sure to review all documentation for the security module prior to implementation:
WHAT:
* [README](https://sourcefuse.github.io/arc-docs/arc-iac-docs/modules/terraform-aws-arc-security/)
* [Module usage guide](https://sourcefuse.github.io/arc-docs/arc-iac-docs/modules/terraform-aws-arc-security/docs/module-usage-guide/)
* Find a way to implement this ONLY in the production account and potentially monitor lower environments.

DONE WHEN:
* You understand how to implement the ARC Security module
* Have a plan in place to only implement this in the production account.
  * (Plus): Able to monitor lower environments without rolling Security Hub out to every account
